verses.text: Mamin Jehová, schaocab' a k'ol ab'an tas svala', yujto ilb'aj in k'ool, te malaj pax vip svab'i.
Colineli, yujto k'anab'ajum in t'ayach. Mamin, colin a in a checab' in tik, yujto a ach tzach vak'och yipoc in k'ool.
Mamin Jehová, ok'ocab' a k'ool t'ayin. Masanil k'u sval in b'a t'ayach.
Mamin, ak' tzalajb'oc in k'ol a in a checab' in tik, yujto a t'ayach tzin lesalvi.
Mamin, te wach' ach, ak'um ach lajvoc chukal. Te niwan a wach'k'olal aycot t'a yib'anh eb' syal sb'a t'ayach.
Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal, maclej ab' tas tzin k'an t'ayach.
Ayic ayin och t'a syaelal sval in b'a t'ayach, yujto tzach tak'vitaxon t'a in lesal.
Mamin Cajalil, malaj junocxo Dios icha val ach tik. Mamin, malaj junok mach syal sb'oan icha tas tza b'o tik.
Mamin, a ach ix a b'o masanil nivac chonhab'. Ol ja eb' yaq'uem sb'a t'ayach, ol yalan wach' lolonel eb' t'ayach,
yujto a achnhej val Dios ach. Nivan elk'ochi, satub'tac tas tza k'ulej.
Mamin Jehová, ch'ox a b'e t'ayin yic wach' tzin b'eyb'alej tas tza nib'ej t'a smasanil in k'ool. Ak' stek'anil in pensar tik yic wach' naanachnhej vuuj.
Ach Vajalil, ach in Diosal, ol valnhej wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a smasanil in k'ool. Ol ach vik'nhejchaanh t'a masanil tiempo.
Yelxo val te niwan a wach'k'olal t'ayin. Maj in a chab'atlaj t'a yet'tal eb' chamnac.
Ach in Diosal, jun val b'ulanh eb' ak'umtac scot t'ayin. Malaj jab'oc yoq'uelk'olal eb', sgana eb' in smilanchamoc. Malaj elk'och t'a sat eb'.
Ha ach xo tik ach Dios Vajalil, te ay a wach'k'olal, te ay oq'uelk'olal. Manh k'unoc scot yoval a k'ool, tzaq'uelk'och tas tzala'.
Ok'oc val a k'ol t'ayin, ilincoti. Ak' val vip, tzin a colanel a in a checab' in tik.
Ak' a wach'k'olal t'ayin t'a sjichanil, yic a ol yilan eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ol q'uixvoc eb', yujto a ach Jehová ach tzach kolwaj ved'oc, tzak'an snivanil in k'ool.
